${ModID}:PentupAnger.NAME: Pent-up Anger
${ModID}:PentupAnger.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this, gain 1 Frail. NL Deal !D! damage and Lose !M! Frail.

${ModID}:OldCostume.NAME: Old Costume
${ModID}:OldCostume.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and give it to ANY character, apply 1 Vulnerable to that character.
${ModID}:OldCostume.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block and give it to ANY character, apply 1 Vulnerable to the character.

${ModID}:ToughFront.NAME: Tough Front
${ModID}:ToughFront.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You gain half Block from your next Block card.

${ModID}:FacetiousFacade.NAME: Facetious Strike
${ModID}:FacetiousFacade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and give it to an enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:RecurringTheme.NAME: Recurring Theme
${ModID}:RecurringTheme.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time you fully lose a debuff, add a *Recurring *Theme to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:RecurringTheme.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time you fully lose a debuff, add a *Recurring *Theme+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Offguard.NAME: Off-guard
${ModID}:Offguard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this, gain !B! Block and 1 Vulnerable. NL Lose !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:CharacterDevelopment.NAME: Character Development
${ModID}:CharacterDevelopment.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength. NL Whenever you fully lose a debuff, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:TheFLYINGCAR.NAME: The FLYING CAR
${ModID}:TheFLYINGCAR.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each time you fully lost a debuff this combat.

${ModID}:Denouement.NAME: Denouement
${ModID}:Denouement.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL This turn, ALL Vulnerable increases attack damage taken by 100% instead.

${ModID}:TheMANSION.NAME: The MANSION
${ModID}:TheMANSION.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Set your Frail and Vulnerable to 1.
